body.p: The exposure draft proposed that a fair value measurement should use the price within the bid‑ask spread that is most representative of fair value in the circumstances. Furthermore, the exposure draft stated that the bid‑ask spread guidance applied at all levels of the fair value hierarchy, when bid and ask prices are relevant (see paragraph BC165), and did not preclude the use of mid‑market pricing or other pricing conventions that are used by market participants as a practical expedient.
